text: The perfect summer tropical theme to relax with a nice drink, I especially like the flute break at 0:57. Captain Rainbow seems to be a great game but was a commercial failure. I feel bad for Skip Ltd really, they never found success with their games: the Chibi-Robo series was only mildly successful with its first game, and both Giftpia and CR never left Japan. They are all very unique games and that may unfortunately be the reason for their failure, people can be turned off by games that look too weird. The great news is that this game has a fan translation so I'll definitely give it a shot one day.
author: SupraDarky

text:
"...people can be turned off by games that look too weird."
And yet, the Katamari series struck gold.
author: EvilMariobot

text:
Never forget that it was the good captain here that got Little Mac back on his feet and in shape for a new Punch-Out!! on the Wii and eventual inclusion as playable in Smash Bros. 4

Thank you for your noble service, Nick.
